publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1326.2 Shona Robison: Health Issues-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1326) in the name of David McLetchie, leave out from "the current" to end and insert "the productivity and efficiency of NHSScotland is declining, and therefore calls on Audit Scotland to undertake a full root-and-branch inquiry into why the performance of NHSScotland has not improved given the substantial increase in funding."
